backend/main.mo: Actor defines user profiles, reports, journaling, and squads with authorization checks and in‑memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing addition of a Schedule Today section linking to a Google Form and mapping it to DailyDashboard.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files covering routing, onboarding, layouts, content, pages, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme setup defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main.tsx with favicon and viewport metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuring all pages, query client, root layout, and error boundaries for the application.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Asse: Mobile‑friendly assessment questionnaire with progress tracking, radio‑based answers, back/next navigation, and completion callback.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Outc: Renders assessment outcomes as cards with sections for measurement, relevance, and multiple insight types including interactive scenarios.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Displays a branded header banner with emblem, title, optional subtext, and a textured gradient background.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/CoachA: Generates and displays prioritized coaching actions based on the latest daily input and readiness calculations.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyL: Provides sliders for logging daily readiness factors with optional guidance and submits collected data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Gamifi: Shows performance tier, streaks, and earned badges based on user inputs and activity streak.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Readin: Displays overall readiness score, factor breakdown, streak info, and analysis for the latest logged data.
frontend/src/components/fieldMode/FieldM: Simple toggle to enable or disable Field Mode using a switch control.
frontend/src/components/izof/AfterTaskRe: Form for submitting post-task performance outcome and reflection, updating an existing IZOF entry.
frontend/src/components/izof/CoachViewPa: Coach-facing summary panel showing weekly stress averages, in-zone frequency, and aggregated emotion counts.
frontend/src/components/izof/CrossFactor: Displays combined insights from IZOF entries, daily inputs, and sleep logs, along with missing data prompts.
frontend/src/components/izof/DailyZoneCh: Form to create a Daily Zone Check entry with stress rating, emotions, and task type, producing an immediate recommendation.
frontend/src/components/izof/RegulationD: Interactive tool showing IZOF stress state and recommendations based on current stress slider input.
frontend/src/components/izof/StressOutco: Shows correlation metrics comparing stress levels and performance outcomes when enough data is available.
frontend/src/components/izof/StressTrend: Renders an SVG line chart visualizing stress ratings over time with markers for high-performance outcomes.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Provides a form UI to create, edit, save, and delete local journal entries with validation and toast notifications.
Defines the main application shell with navigation, sidebar state management, user identity handling, and responsive layout logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageScaff: Wraps pages with consistent spacing, optional title/description, and layout constraints.
frontend/src/components/mentalPerformanc: Empty placeholder file for a motivational video card component.
Empty placeholder file for a YouTube player dialog component.
frontend/src/components/missions/Mission: Renders a mission card showing title, briefing, lock status, rewards, and assessment-based unlock logic.
Displays mission results including pass/fail, score, XP, win conditions, timed performance, and action buttons.
Runs mission steps, handles scoring, timed steps, and produces the final MissionResult.
frontend/src/components/missions/Operato: Shows operator rank, XP progress, and unlocked items using mission progression data.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Onboarding form that collects optional profile info and required disclaimer and guideline acceptance before saving to local profile.
frontend/src/components/reports/Personal: Dialog for creating, editing, and submitting personal reports with metadata and XP calculation.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Dialog allowing users to submit abuse reports with a reason and optional details via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/SoldierConnect/F: Dialog component allowing users to locally flag SoldierConnect content with a reason and optional notes.
frontend/src/components/SoldierConnect/R: Reaction bar for SoldierConnect items showing counts and enabling four reaction types with optional compact mode.
frontend/src/components/system/AppStartu: Full‑screen error state with retry option for app startup failures.
frontend/src/components/system/InitWarni: Banner that displays initialization warnings when present.
frontend/src/components/system/RouteErro: React error boundary that shows a startup error UI and allows retry by reloading the page.
frontend/src/components/tools/MilitaryAp: Dialog displaying full details, usage guidance, tags, and download links for a selected military app.
Static content mapping assessment outcome IDs to explanations, relevance, and scenario-based insights.
frontend/src/content/assessments.ts: Defines assessment metadata and question sets for personality and resilience questionnaires, including scoring keys and short descriptions.
Documentation describing assessment flow, data structures, scoring logic, and how to extend questions and outcomes.
frontend/src/content/dailyFactorGuidance: Provides guidance objects for daily self-ratings with polarity rules and detailed 0–100 anchor descriptions.
frontend/src/content/dailyQuotes.ts: Stores motivational quote data with authors, categories, annotations, and auto-generated IDs.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Contains the app’s legal disclaimer text regarding non-affiliation with the U.S. Army and OPSEC responsibility.
frontend/src/content/izofEducation.ts: Provides educational content explaining IZOF, stress types, individuality, and real-world performance examples.
frontend/src/content/izofRegulationSkill: Defines techniques for increasing or decreasing arousal to help users regulate stress levels.
frontend/src/content/leaderGuidance.ts: Defines interfaces and a dataset of leader guidance tied to assessment outcomes, detailing team roles, communication, friction points, and coaching strategies.
frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/f: Provides structured content for free soldier apps including Libby instructions and app cards with usage guidance, links, and tags.
frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/r: Defines book content structure, a Libby how‑to guide, and a curated reading list focused on leadership, resilience, and mental performance.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Contains mission definitions with briefings, decisions, timed scenarios, win conditions, XP rewards, side quests, and reflection prompts.
frontend/src/content/sleepPerformanceCop: Provides sleep performance copy including dashboard text, mode descriptions, educational tiles, and downshift routines.
Defines a static dataset of military-related mobile apps with metadata such as usage, download links, and tags.
frontend/src/contexts/DashboardRefreshCo: Provides a React context for triggering dashboard refreshes using an incrementing token.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssessments.ts: Manages local assessment storage, history, trends, and unlock helpers using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboard.ts: Handles daily readiness input processing, score calculation, streak logic, and local storage updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFieldMode.ts: Stores and toggles a local 'field mode' boolean in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, identity persistence, and login state management via a React provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Detects whether the viewport width is under a specified breakpoint to support responsive behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useIzof.ts: Manages IZOF daily entries, recommendations, and updates tied to a local profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useIzofSettings.ts: Loads and updates IZOF settings such as coach view and range overrides for the local profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useLifeLessonsProgres: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalData.ts: Provides React hooks for local journals, daily inputs, and readiness state tied to the current profile UUID.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Manages the device-scoped local profile with storage syncing and update/reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalReports.ts: Handles CRUD, submission, and XP application for locally stored personal reports.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionProgression: Manages XP, rank, unlockables, and mission history using localStorage per profile UUID.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps React Query for local-only and backend-dependent operations with graceful degradation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuoteReflections.t: Loads and saves per-quote user reflections scoped to the local profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingProgress.ts: Tracks per-book reading state and timestamps in localStorage by profile UUID.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingRewards.ts: Grants reading-based XP and badges with deduplication and mission progression integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepPerformance.t: Manages local sleep and caffeine logs, updates performance state, and computes sleep-related metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoldierConnect.ts: Handles Soldier Connect data, including threads, stories, challenges, notifications, and XP, with local persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, layout rules, and utility classes for themes and responsiveness.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Displays and manages backend abuse reports, supporting status updates and handling offline fallback.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentHistory.tsx: Shows assessment history and trends with tabbed navigation and local assessment data.
Displays leader-focused guidance for completed assessments, pulling latest results and showing team role insights.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentResults.tsx: Shows detailed results for a completed assessment, including scores, outcome content, and reward notifications.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentRun.tsx: Runs an assessment questionnaire, scores answers, saves results, applies rewards, and navigates to the results page.
frontend/src/pages/Assessments.tsx: Main entry for the assessments module, listing available assessments, progress, and navigation to history and leader view.
frontend/src/pages/DailyDashboard.tsx: Daily readiness dashboard showing input logging, readiness metrics, coach actions, and scheduling link with offline support.
frontend/src/pages/DailyQuotes.tsx: Displays the daily motivational quote and allows users to write and save personal reflections locally.
frontend/src/pages/FreeSoldierApps.tsx: Renders a filterable list of free mental‑health apps with expandable cards and a Libby DoD guide.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Provides UI to view, create, and join squad groups using dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/GroupSharedEntries.ts: Displays a squad’s shared reflection entries with member data and controls for copying, rotating, or leaving the group.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Fetches and displays community guidelines with loading handling and styled content.
frontend/src/pages/IZOF.tsx: Main IZOF hub offering links to zone checks, education, skills, dashboard, and a coach‑view toggle.
frontend/src/pages/IZOFDailyZoneCheck.ts: Handles the daily zone check flow, showing existing entries, creating new ones, and adding after‑task reflections.
frontend/src/pages/IZOFEducation.tsx: Displays IZOF education content using multiple cards populated from static content.
Shows arousal regulation techniques and a decision helper, with content sourced from REGULATION_SKILLS.
frontend/src/pages/IZOFStressReadinessDa: Provides a dashboard with stress trends, IZOF range estimates, correlations, and pattern detection based on user entries.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Local journal page enabling creation, editing, and viewing of private entries with optional prefill.
frontend/src/pages/LifeLessonsRemoved.ts: Informs users that the Life Lessons section was removed and links to alternative resources.
frontend/src/pages/MentalPerformanceRead: Renders a recommended reading list with progress tracking, collapsible book details, and reward badges.
frontend/src/pages/MilitaryApps.tsx: Lists military-related apps with search, tag filtering, and a dialog for detailed app information.
frontend/src/pages/MissionRun.tsx: Runs a mission by ID, handles mission progression, and shows either the interactive runner or debrief.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Displays missions grouped by category with tabs and operator progression, allowing users to start missions.
frontend/src/pages/MotivationalLifeLesso: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of personal reports and displays them sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Provides profile editing, device info display, and local data reset functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceActio: Shows tactical sleep guidance, caffeine logging, and personalized recommendations based on sleep state.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceAnaly: Analyzes sleep debt and maps it to performance impacts with visual indicators and explanations.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceCheck: Form page for logging sleep times, quality, pain, and stress inputs, then saving via logSleep and navigating to analysis.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceDashb: Dashboard displaying sleep logs, debt, readiness, and risk metrics with navigation to related views.
frontend/src/pages/SoldierConnect/Soldie: Home hub for Soldier Connect showing sections like discussions, stories, mentorship, and notifications with counts and navigation.
Layout wrapper providing navigation tabs and routing for Soldier Connect subpages.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Empty placeholder file for squads page.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Empty placeholder file for squad shared entries page.
frontend/src/types/assessments.ts: Type definitions for assessments, including questions, outcomes, scoring, and stored results.
frontend/src/types/izof.ts: Type definitions for IZOF stress zone tracking, entries, and user settings.
frontend/src/types/legacy.ts: Legacy type definitions for journaling, groups, reports, IZOF entries, and personal reports.
frontend/src/types/mentalPerformance.ts: Type definitions for mental performance app content, tags, guides, and downloadable app metadata.
frontend/src/types/militaryApps.ts: Type definitions for military app metadata, tags, and download links.
frontend/src/types/missions.ts: Type definitions for mission structures, steps, unlock rules, results, and rank progression utilities.
frontend/src/types/motivationalVideos.ts: Empty placeholder file for motivational video types.
frontend/src/types/personalReports.ts: Defines types for personal reports, including report fields, metadata, and input shapes for creating or updating reports.
frontend/src/types/soldierConnect.ts: Contains all Soldier Connect data models such as threads, replies, stories, mentor notes, challenges, reactions, flags, notifications, and state.
frontend/src/utils/assessmentScoring.ts: Implements scoring logic for dimensional, type-based, and band assessments, producing outcome IDs, labels, and score maps.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Maps backend error messages to simplified user-facing messages and actions, handling offline, capacity, permission, validation, and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/dailyRotation.ts: Generates a deterministic daily index by hashing the current date and mapping it to a dataset length.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCode.ts: Normalizes invite codes by trimming whitespace only.
frontend/src/utils/izofAnalytics.ts: Provides stress analytics including trend extraction, correlation summaries, pattern detection, weekly averages, and zone frequency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/izofIntegration.ts: Generates cross-factor insights by combining IZOF stress data with sleep and training inputs, also identifying missing data.
frontend/src/utils/izofLogic.ts: Implements IZOF range estimation, stress-zone recommendations, stress-state categorization, and validation for Daily Zone Check inputs.
frontend/src/utils/localDataStore.ts: Defines device-local data types and localStorage CRUD helpers for journals, readiness inputs, sleep logs, caffeine logs, IZOF data, and reports.
frontend/src/utils/localProfileStorage.t: Manages device-local profile data with UUID generation, loading, saving, updating, and reset utilities.
frontend/src/utils/militaryAppsFilter.ts: Provides keyword and tag-based filtering for Military Apps datasets.
frontend/src/utils/quoteId.ts: Generates deterministic quote IDs using a simple hash of quote and author.
frontend/src/utils/readinessSemantics.ts: Maps factor scores to readiness-friendly values, color classes, and explanation bands based on polarity.
frontend/src/utils/reportXp.ts: Computes deterministic XP for report text based on length thresholds.
frontend/src/utils/sleepPerformance.ts: Computes sleep debt and related performance metrics, formats sleep windows, estimates caffeine clearance, and provides pain/stress guidance.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectDeepLin: Builds and parses deep links for Soldier Connect threads and stories with optional prefilled fields.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectNotific: Creates Soldier Connect notifications for replies, weekly highlights, mentor notes, and challenge reminders.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectStore.t: Handles localStorage persistence and CRUD operations for Soldier Connect threads, stories, replies, reactions, flags, and notifications.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectXp.ts: Defines XP constants and helper functions for calculating XP for Soldier Connect actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validateMotivationalV: Empty placeholder file for motivational video validation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/youtubeId.ts: Extracts YouTube video IDs from various URL formats and validates or generates search URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and current state for app development tracking.
